title: Camera locked options bug
body:
Per-Side and Fixed both have the champion in the middle of the screen.
When originally per-side had it off set.
I've been playing with semi-locked because of this but, I have motion sickness which is why I have always used the per-side ever since it came out.
:C Is there a possible fix coming out soon for it?

replies.body:
Hey toravi - 

We're aware of this issue and are currently investigating what's going on here.
Thank you so much! As someone who relies on this, I really do appreciate it.
Id really love an update on this bug as it pretty much breaks the game for people who rely on it but i dont think riot are going to put this on there "to-do" list anytime soon which is sad.

Yeah I have the same problem, which makes it especially hard when on the red side. All locked camera options, per side or semi locked, all are the same, with my champ in the center. Please fix Riot, it's hard to play
And also I kinda have to play with it locked cause I play with a trackpad XD so I can't move my cursor as freely to move the screen/camera
